软件包 com.sinosoft.one.mvc.web.validation.annotation

枚举摘要
PatternEx.Flag Possible Regexp flags
 

注释类型摘要
AssertFalseEx The annotated element must be false.
AssertTrueEx The annotated element must be true.
DecimalMaxEx The annotated element must be a number whose value must be lower or equal to the specified maximum.
DecimalMinEx The annotated element must be a number whose value must be higher or equal to the specificed minimum.
DigitsEx The annotated element must be a number within accepted range Supported types are: BigDecimal BigInteger String byte, short, int, long, and their respective wrapper types

null elements are considered valid
FutureEx The annotated element must be a date in the future.
MaxEx The annotated element must be a number whose value must be lower or equal to the specified maximum.
MinEx The annotated element must be a number whose value must be higher or equal to the specified minimum.
NotBlankEx The annotated element must not be null or "".
NotEmptyEx Asserts that the annotated string, collection, map or array is not null or empty.
NotNullEx The annotated element must not be null.
NullEx The annotated element must be null.
PastEx The annotated element must be a date in the past.
PatternEx The annotated String must match the following regular expression.
SizeEx The annotated element size must be between the specified boundaries (included).
Validation 加上此注解采用默认的验证器验证相关对象
